personal.name: Jeremiah Rosales
personal.title: Software Developer
personal.tagline: I love building websites and focusing on back-end projects.

bio: I'm a software developer with a passion for building user-centric products. I enjoy turning complex problems into elegant, accessible solutions.
My specialties include front-end frameworks, TypeScript, Node.js, and building reliable APIs and developer-friendly tooling.

projects.title: AI-assisted Shift Analyzer and Payroll Generation
projects.description: A tool to analyze employee shifts and generate payroll automatically using AI.
projects.detailedDescription: Developed with Python and integrated with prediction models to process shift data and produce accurate payroll reports.

projects.title: WGY Travel Agency Website
projects.description: A landing page for a travel agency showcasing tours and booking options.
projects.detailedDescription: Built with WordPress and Elementor, featuring responsive design and SEO optimization.

projects.title: LiLo Invoice Automation
projects.description: Website for automating invoice generation and management of LiLo, an employee time management app, subscriptions.
projects.detailedDescription: Used Node.js and Express to create a backend service that automates invoice creation based on user activity and subscription plans.

projects.title: Philippine Post Office ID Application Dashboard
projects.description: Website for monitoring applications for Postal IDs in the Philippines.
projects.detailedDescription: Developed the backend with Node.js and Express and PostgreSQL to handle data analytics and status updates for users applying for Postal IDs.

experience.description: Developed the backend of applications using Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL.
Worked on GoHighLevel and n8n to automate business processes and improve efficiency for clients.
Built and maintained websites for various clients using WordPress, Elementor, and custom coding solutions.
